article_title: Building an App Portfolio for Innovation
article_text: CIOs are increasingly looking at out-of-the-box, cloud based solutions to replace legacy applications they believe are inhibiting progress, writes Guest Contributor Ron Tolido. But before doing anything drastic, alignment between business and IT has to be a priority. “If adoption is to have a drastic impact on organizations,” he writes, CIOs “have to seriously revisit their existing business process and ways of working.”

article_summary:
CIOs are increasingly looking at out-of-the-box, cloud based solutions to replace legacy applications they believe are inhibiting progress, writes Guest Contributor Ron Tolido.
